item.title: Miracle Black & White Necklace M04
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
One of Miracle's most playful, Black & White necklace is a skillful creation that is essential by design, but sophisticated and time consuming in its handcrafted and detailed execution. A comfortable necklace to wear, this one tempts you to incorporate it into your outfits on a daily basis. Despite its name, the necklace should by no means be considered as created in a monochromatic color scheme. This is due to the gracious row of red spaced out beads, serving as an appropriately stylish accent. Overall, this beautifully designed necklace feels quite lively and perfectly complete.

The post Miracle Black & White Necklace M04 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
One of Miracle’s most playful, Black & White necklace is a skillful creation that is essential by design, but sophisticated and time consuming in its handcrafted and detailed execution. A comfortable necklace to wear, this one tempts you to incorporate it into your outfits on a daily basis. Despite its name, the necklace should by no means be considered as created in a monochromatic color scheme. This is due to the gracious row of red spaced out beads, serving as an appropriately stylish accent. Overall, this beautifully designed necklace feels quite lively and perfectly complete.

About Miracle

Miracle is a unique brand that is based in refined, sophisticated and feminine accessories. Accessories that combine a sense of jewelry tradition with notions of elegant, modern and contemporary jewelry. Truly a designer brand, Miracle seems to embody the commitment to a woman’s passion for outstanding accessories, creating undeniably beautiful pieces, from necklaces to earrings and bracelets. Miracle’s apt selection of favorite materials includes howlite, quartz, cat’s eye and agate. Taking a piece of Miracle’s jewelry into a hand, one can’t help but acknowledge the brand’s unmistakable original style that combines true refinement with sensual elegance.

The post Miracle Black & White Necklace M04 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Miracle Blue Kaleidoscope Necklace M02
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
One of Miracle's most playful pieces, Blue Kaleidoscope necklace is a skillful creation that is essential by design, but sophisticated and time consuming in its handcrafted and detailed execution. A comfortable necklace to wear, this one tempts you to incorporate it into your outfits on a daily basis. This necklace is created in a sparkling and vibrant blue and silver color scheme with occasional green, white and black beads serving as stylish accents. Rows of sparkling silver and sky blue beads make this necklace feel unique and lively.

The post Miracle Blue Kaleidoscope Necklace M02 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Miracle Kaleidoscope Necklace M03
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
One of Miracle's most playful necklaces, Kaleidoscope is a skillful creation that is essential by design, but sophisticated and time consuming in its handcrafted and detailed execution. A comfortable necklace to wear, this one tempts you to incorporate it into your outfits on a daily basis. The necklace is created in a sparkling and vibrant color scheme with occasional blue, green and red beads serving as stylish accents. The sparkling beads along with colorful accents make this necklace come alive, feeling dynamic and vibrant.

The post Miracle Kaleidoscope Necklace M03 appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
